entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning this evening then changing to rain before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this evening. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
